title: '??::1BED 1 BATH INCOME RESTRICTIONS SEC-42**/
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 605 Sq.', 'Ft.', "Look no further for great apartment home living in Concord, CA, because you've found it at Sun Ridge Apartments.", 'Just minutes from dining and entertainment, with easy access to public transportation, shopping and freeways.', 'Sun Ridge Apartments is located in the Mt. Diablo School District.', 'Our apartment homes are guaranteed to make your life comfortable and convenient.??', 'With a large variety of floor plans to choose from, finding the right apartment home to fit your needs has never been easier.', 'Our apartment homes feature air conditioning, some paid utilities, walk-in closets, ceiling fans, carpeted and hardwood floors.', 'All of these amenities are designed to enhance your style of living.', 'Our community also offers laundry facilities for your convenience, parking for your guests, playground for your children and a shimmering swimming pool to relax in after a long day from work.', 'Designed with your comfort in mind, Sun Ridge Apartment homes will fit all your needs here in Concord, CA.', 'Apply at <URL> to join the Waiting List', 'Features:', 'Air Conditioning, Some Paid Utilities, Energy Star Appliances, Covered Parking, Fully Equipped Kitchens, Walk-In Closets', 'Community Amenities:', 'Swimming Pool, Kids First Recreation Room, Easy Access to Shopping, Close to Dining and Entertainment, Additional Storage Available, Clubhouse, Easy Access to Freeways (680, 242 & 24), Public Transportation Accessible, Near Downtown, On-site Maintenance, Located in Excellent Mt. Diablo School District, Playground, On-call Maintenance, Recycling Program, Laundry Facility', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets not allowed.', 'Income Requirements:', 'Section 42 Tax Credit Income Restrictions', 'Use the link below for more details:', '<URL>', 'Disclaimer: Please be aware of scams on Craigslist.', 'It is our practice never to require someone to complete a credit application or provide personal credit information before touring an apartment home.', 'Rent is based on lease term selected.', 'Please contact office for more details.', 'Prices subject to change.', 'YyZkf9yg']
